prompts: Create a horse-like Pokemon with flaming mane and a cheerful expression.
Show me a fire-type Pokemon that represents speed and agility with vibrant colors.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies warmth and energy, featuring bright orange and yellow flames.
Design a Pokemon that roams grassy fields and has a majestic fiery appearance.
Imagine a mythical creature with a fiery mane, known for its swift movement and grace.
Give me a Pokemon with a playful personality, known for its speed and striking color palette.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of fire and horse features, perfect for racing.
